title: Crooked Little Vein
description: The bestselling comic-book writer of Authority and Transmetropolitan brings his trippy and fast-paced style to the publishing world with his first detective novel.A burned-out private detective is enlisted by an army of presidential goons to retrieve the U.S. Constitution...the real one. Following in the steps of Neil Gaiman, Crooked Little Vein is packed with action, adventure, and a wild cast of characters that are sure to appease not only hardcore comic fans, but a whole new slew of mystery readers waiting for a surprisingly surreal treat that infuses the madness of the graphic-novel world.
author: Warren Ellis
